name: JustOneShot
description:
Do not full-screen.

WebGL version has a terrible performance. If you can't stand it, download the Windows build zip file (sorry Mac users).

For Gameplay:

Go near the ball until there's a sound, then click on the ball, drag and release. Sometimes the hitbox can be weird. Do not overlap the player on the ball, as you will not be able to click on it ( some render layer issue not fixed).
